infotexts.entitydescription.loas_preale: Europan Ale precursor made from mashing elastin
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_premead: Salt Mead precursor made from mashing salt bulbs
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_premoon: Blood Moonshine precursor made from stirring alien blood
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prewhis: Earthers Whiskey precursor made from mashing fertilizer
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_precide: Pomegrenade Cider precursor made from mashing pomegrenade
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prerum: Submariners Rum precursor made from mashing tobacco buds
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prewine: Bane Wine precursor made from mashing raptorbane
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pregin: Coalition Gin precursor made from stirring sodium
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prevod: Separatist Vodka precursor made from stirring chlorine
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prebit: Jupiter Bitters precursor made from mashing multiple ingredients
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ale: Europan made ale, created using local ingredients
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_mead: Europa's signature mead made from salt bulbs
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_moon: Strong moonshine made from the blood of Europa's creatures
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_whis: Classic whiskey made from the fresh dirt of earth
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cide: Cider made from the juice of pomegrenades, for the light drinkers
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rum: Rum has been a true seafarers desired drink for a very long time, Popular among captains
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_wine: A high class drink made from a toxic plant, safe for consumption due to thorough brewing
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_gin: Nice and smooth Coalition brewed gin, favored by admirals
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_vodka: Vodka homebrewed by the Jovian Separatists and commonly found amongst their ranks
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_bitters: Masterfully made bitters, commonly used in high class mixology
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pmoon: A small glass containing Blood Moonshine
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pwhis: A small glass containing Earthers Whiskey
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_prum: A small glass containing Submariners Rum
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pwine: A small glass containing Bane Wine
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pgin: A small glass containing Coalition Gin
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pvod: A small glass containing Separatist Vodka
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_mixg: A new spin on the old formula
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_mixw: A glass of whiskey on the rocks with a sparkling spin
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_mixm: A nice blend of mead and ale perfect for anyone with a sweet tooth
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_mixr: A weirdly sour drink made from some top shelf drinks
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_aleage: Finely aged Europan ale, it seems to have taken on a darker color
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_meadage: Finely aged Europan salt mead, Popular among miners and other labor workers
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_moonage: Thoroughly aged moonshine, A strong drink and a favorite among renegades and criminals
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_whisage: Finely made and finely aged, a nice memory of earth
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rumage: A real soul soothing drink, found in almost every wealthy captains collection
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_wineage: A priceless drink made from raptorbane, only royalty and high ranking officials would even dare touch this fortune of a drink
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ginage: A finely aged Coalition Gin, the high class dink of Europa
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_vodage: A real mules kick, favored by all renegade commanders
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_vodr: RedVibe is a Europan company dedicated to providing flavored vodka at reasonable prices, their vodka has a noticeable fruity smell and bitter aftertaste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rums: SLAM Rum is made by a group of distillers located somewhere in the Europan Ridge, the Coalition has designated the group as pirates yet still allows their products to be sold at outpost for an unknown reason
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigeaz: An Eazer brand cigarette made from Europan grown tobacco
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigep: Europan Premium cigarettes are know for their improved filters and better taste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigmar: Marcello Inc Cigarettes are an experimental brand infused with nanites, beware that these may be very addictive
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigpc: Premium Europan cigar made from a mix of local and old earth tobacco, favored among captains and generals
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigeth: Eazer recently introduced a stronger cigarette in the form of the ethanol joint to help sailors with anxiety for an affordable price
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigelec: Electronic cigarettes are often advertised as being a less harmful alternative to normal cigarettes however they are also known to be more addictive, requires a battery cell to use
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigpack: Europa's universal cigarette pack made to carry 6 cigarettes
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cigcase: A custom made cigar case used to hold Europan cigars
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rchick: Raw rubbery looking synthetic chicken made from the organs and blood of local wildlife, you probably shouldn't eat this uncooked
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rsteak: Raw squishy looking synthetic steak made from the organs and blood of local wildlife, you probably shouldn't eat this uncooked
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_bread: A stale loaf of Europan bread made from synthiflour
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_sbread: A stale slice of an Europan made loaf of bread
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_water: A canteen filled with filtered Europan water, it is safe for consumption
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_apple: Europan apples are genetically engineered versions of earth's apples now capable of growing in any old planter box
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_banana: Europan bananas were genetically engineered to make them grow from smaller vine like plants so that they could be grown in compact planter boxes
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_coil: A bottle of locally made cooking oil for use in recipes, you probably shouldn't drink this on its own
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_spice: A spice mill containing locally made spices made out of Europan ingredients to be used in cooking recipes
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_chick: Synthichicken is the most popular type of meat on Europa as it is widely regarded as being atleast decent in taste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_steak: Synthisteak is the synthetic version of the classic steak, many have reported it tastes faintly of mudraptor
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_csand: This sandwich is a classic Europan breakfast due to its easy preparation and good overall taste and texture
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cslad: The Europan spin on the classic Caesar salad, many that have tasted the original claim this taste awful however it is still a very popular salad
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_burg: One of the most popular fast foods on Europa, this burger is made from synthisteak and a range of fresh Europan ingredients
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_fries: Humanities most recognized fast food has been given a Europan spin due to the lack of potatoes, many say this is one of the few Europan things better than the original
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pizza: Pizza Europa is an attempt made at making the famous dish here on the icy moon, whether it succeeded or not is debatable
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_pasta: Europan cooks eventually tried to make their own version of a classic Italian dish and its widely regarded as being a pretty good dish due to its many flavours
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_stew: Submariners Stew is the most common food item on Europa as its cheap to make this does however come at the cost of its taste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_fslad: The classic fruit salad remains popular on Europa even if it is now made using different ingredients, many claim that its the most refreshing food item on Europa
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ejuice: This juice is made from fresh Europan ingredients, its simple and easily made and because of that popular aswell
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_cola: Coalition Cola is the most popular soda on Europa and its mostly because it backed by the Europa Coalition itself, that and the fact that its used as a cheap alternative to sleep
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_teas: Europans believe that saltbulb tea helps repel bacteria and parasites and as such it has become a popular tea for travelers
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_psand: A standard cheap vending machine sandwich, bland in taste due to being comprised of a large amount artificial ingredients
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_bento: A fully precooked and packed classic bento lunchbox containing various small dishes, chopsticks included
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_candy: Europan made candies oftenly found in vending machines, probably not good for your teeth
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_popc: Popped saltbulbs and their seeds closely resemble the classic movie theater snack and as such have been given the title of popcorn
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_fruitb: A fruit bar made from pomegrenade seeds and local hydroponic fruits, the taste is said to vary drastically depending on the quality of the fruits used
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_chocob: The Coalition recently introduced chocolate bars available in most local vending machines to help combat the rapid increase in psychosis incidents, no one knows how the chocolate bars are made
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_sodae: Euro Soda is a local company that was created as a direct competitor to the Coalition funded Coalition Cola, Euro Soda is known for being a cheap carbonated drink
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_juices: Premium fruit juice produced by the Europan Jesters Association, many report feeling happy and unable to stop smiling after drinking the juice, the juice is currently under investigation by the Coalition for being a possible health risk
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ration1: Ration units are used by the Coalition to help the less fortunate inhabitants of Europa as they are usually free to outpost inhabitants and cost very little for travelers, This one is marked as a Minimal Tier Ration Unit [AIM + USE TO OPEN]
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ration2: Ration units are used by the Coalition to help the less fortunate inhabitants of Europa as they are usually free to outpost inhabitants and cost very little for travelers, This one is marked as a Standard Tier Ration Unit [AIM + USE TO OPEN]
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ration3: Ration units are used by the Coalition to help the less fortunate inhabitants of Europa as they are usually free to outpost inhabitants and cost very little for travelers, This one is marked as a Loyalist Tier Ration Unit [AIM + USE TO OPEN]
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_ration4: Ration units are used by the Coalition to help the less fortunate inhabitants of Europa as they are usually free to outpost inhabitants and cost very little for travelers, This one is marked as a Priority Tier Ration Unit [AIM + USE TO OPEN]
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rwater: Canned water often found within ration units, not the best tasting water as many have reported it has a chemical taste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rbeer: Coalition branded beer is included in loyalist ration units as a reward for their service and as such it is fairly common amongst Coalition marines
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_retha: Juniper Ethanol is a classic Europan drink that was created by a group of Coalition generals and because of that it ended up in the Priority Tier Ration Unit
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rpaste: This small box contains a gelatinated calorie paste meal often found within ration units, the box labels it as egg flavored
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rbar: This desiccated ration bar contains a bunch of vitamins and calories to help sustain the person consuming it, the packaging labels it as water flavored
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rfish: These synthetic sardines are created from various meats coming from the creatures on Europa, they are described as being an acquired taste and as such are only found in ration units
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rsupp: Survival supplements are used to maintain the consumers muscle mass and because of that they are often included within ration units
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rchoco: Dried cacao bars are used to help maintain sanity amongst outpost inhabitants as they contain a small dose of haloperidol, it has been reported that overconsumption may lead to brain damage
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rbran: Bran flakes are Europa's only cereal substitute and became part of most ration units because of this, many use water or even alien blood as a substitute for milk
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rchips: This Coalition branded bag holds a small amount of dehydrated pomegrenade chips that stay fresh incredibly long, they are described as being incredibly bland in taste
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rbread: Coalition ration bread has been nicknamed brick bread due to being incredibly hard, Coalition bread is cheap to produce and because of that it became common in ration units
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rclump: Vegetable clumps are made using various Europan plants and fruits, they are also filled with various chemicals to keep them shelf stable
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rnuts: A small Coalition branded bag containing a heap of nuts and seeds commonly found on Europa, a recent survey shows that this is the highest rated snack amongst captains
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_garhat: A small brownish cap that smells vaguely of cigarette smoke, it seems to hide the wearers eyes, has a built in auto injector
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rec: A classic record player made to play vinyl records, the most popular entertainment source for any Europan sailors
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_piano: The piano has always been a staple of music and on Europa this is no different, pianos are often costly due to the amount work and knowledge required to make one, this specific piano has the brand label 'HUB' on it
infotexts.entityname.loas_record6: Record: Fly Me To The Moon
infotexts.entityname.loas_rs6: Song: Fly Me To The Moon
infotexts.entitydescription.loas_rmach: The Europa Coalition offers to sell their ration dispensers for use on private submarines, they are often found on military submarines
